content.description: PLACES WHERE FRENCH IS AN OFFICIAL LANGUAGE
content.question: How does the map illustrate global diffusion of the French language from its cultural hearth in Paris?

choices.label: The map shows how French-language movies, music, and literature dominate global entertainment media.
The map shows how France was an ancient-culture hearth from which the French language spread through expansion diffusion.
The map shows how in many areas of the former French empire the language persists despite the independence of former colonies.
The map shows how French civil servants established schools in many parts of the French colonial empire.
The map shows how peopleâ€™s love of French food has facilitated the spread of the French language to many parts of the world.

content.answer: The map shows how in many areas of the former French empire the language persists despite the independence of former colonies.
